articles.content: Gary Lineker has aimed a light-hearted dig at Manchester United after a mishap on BBC's breaking news ticker saw the club labelled 'rubbish' on Tuesday. The text was shown during a live sport update … [+1415 chars]

articles.title: NBA coach Steve Kerr angrily demands more vetted background checks after Texas massacre - Daily Mail
articles.description: NBA coach Steve Kerr lost his temper as he demanded background checks for guns in the wake of Tuesday's massacre at a Texas school that killed 19 children.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tottenham star Son gets hero's welcome in South Korea as he parades Premier League Golden Boot - Daily Mail
articles.description: Son Heung-min has been given a hero's welcome in South Korea having returned home with the Premier League Golden Boot. The Tottenhamd winger racked up 23 goals.
articles.content:

articles.title: West Ham's Kurt Zouma bombarded with racist abuse and death threats after cat footage - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY SAMI MOKBEL: Zouma pleaded guilty to two counts under the Animal Welfare Act when he appeared at Thames Magistrates' Court in east London on Tuesday morning.
